title: The media will become terminally addicted to gambling
description: Gambling devoured sports media, and it only took about ten years. It seems clear that something similar is under way with politics coverage, too, with the rise of prediction markets. And I think this time it goes faster. A narrow and true story about prediction markets as they relate to our understanding of politics is...
